xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #phenotips on 03 May 2013
xwikidoc.content: <tishan> has joined #phenotips 02:42 <qwebirc72159> has quit 03:57 <sdumitriu> has quit 03:59 <sdumitriu> has joined #phenotips 05:04 <marta> has quit 05:05 <marta> has joined #phenotips 07:34 <qwebirc50117> has joined #phenotips 07:37 <qwebirc50117> Hello can anybody help me here? 07:42 <qwebirc50117> has quit 08:37 <tishan> has quit 08:42 <sdumitriu> Hey Natasha 08:44 <sdumitriu> You didn't submit your application yet 09:48 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #phenotips 10:28 <Tishan> has joined #phenotips 10:33 <Tishan> sdumitriu: Hi 10:36 <sdumitriu> Hi Tishan 10:36 <Tishan> did you had a chance to go through the proposal I put 10:37 <sdumitriu> Not yet, a bit later 10:37 <Tishan> ok :) 10:40 <sdumitriu> kushalkhandelwal: Going to the office, if somebody looks for me, tell them to wait a few minutes 10:43 <ravigarg27> has joined #phenotips 10:44 <froggy> has quit 10:49 <Natasha> has quit 10:49 <Natasha> has joined #phenotips 10:49 <Natasha> has quit 10:56 <sdumitriu1> has joined #phenotips 11:06 <gustavojordan> has joined #phenotips 11:19 <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu: saw your msg just now was out for dinner 11:19 <sdumitriu1> No problem 11:19 <sdumitriu1> Nobody was looking for me 11:19 <kushalkhandelwal> I guess froggy was looking for you in #ccm 11:20 <kushalkhandelwal> [20:23] <froggy> ping 12:19 <ravigarg27> has quit 12:25 <kushalkhandelwal> has quit 12:35 <sdumitriu1> Hi gustavojordan 13:22 <Tishan> sdumitriu1: Any chance with the proposal? 13:28 <gustavojordan> hi sdumitriu 13:41 <gustavojordan> sorry for the delay, was at lunch... 13:50 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #phenotips 13:53 <kushalkhandelwal> The last hour for applications :) 14:00 <gustavojordan> has quit 14:00 <gustavojordan> has joined #phenotips 14:07 <sdumitriu1> gustavojordan: Hi again 14:07 <sdumitriu1> I liked your proposal 14:07 <gustavojordan> sure? Oh, thanks 14:08 <gustavojordan> :-) i'm very happy 14:08 <sdumitriu1> My first question is what's your experience with this kind of device 14:09 <kushalkhandelwal> is now known as <kushalk124> 14:10 <gustavojordan> ok, I started in my undergraduate scientific initiation scholarship...developing a 3D puzzle game for MS Kinect (with OpenNI), so at the end of 2010, after it write paper to the CLEI 2011, 14:11 <sdumitriu1> OK, nice 14:12 <sdumitriu1> Then in the architecture, you say that you're communicating between the browser and the second layer (WNUI( through WebSockets 14:13 <sdumitriu1> Do you mean that you're communicating to the server, or directly to the browser? 14:14 <gustavojordan> After I worked at Company Corollarium Technologies using the Kinect to develop commercial applications, at the end of my degree I used as end-of-course project...and continue working with Kinect in my masters.. 14:15 <gustavojordan> Ok, i'll explain 14:18 <gustavojordan> the wnui will provide for the browser communication between the device (to catch data of gestures) so the data can be sent to the server 14:19 <gustavojordan> server requests by phenotips 14:21 <gustavojordan> I answered your question? 14:22 <sdumitriu1> Yes, but I'm not sure this is the right approach 14:22 <sdumitriu1> The server only cares about data 14:23 <sdumitriu1> The WNUI should send gestures to the browser, which uses them to manipulate what the user sees in the browser 14:23 <sdumitriu1> Flipping switches, scrolling, activating controls, etc 14:23 <gustavojordan> yes 14:24 <sdumitriu1> Then when the user saves the record, the server just gets the outcome: the actual patient data 14:25 <gustavojordan> correctly , is my idea , But perhaps I am wrong in words. 14:26 <sdumitriu1> OK 14:26 <sdumitriu1> Sent you a comment 14:27 <sdumitriu1> Tishan: Reading your proposal now, are you here? 14:27 <Tishan> yes 14:27 <sdumitriu1> OK, first, you should write a longer description 14:27 <Tishan> noted 14:27 <sdumitriu1> That field is supposed to be understandable by others looking at the project description alone 14:28 <sdumitriu1> So, it's an abstract that presents your project to the world 14:28 <gustavojordan> Sure, I'll read, thanks sdumitriu 14:28 <sdumitriu1> (this part will be public) 14:29 <Tishan> do u mean the short description section 14:30 <sdumitriu1> Yes 14:30 <Tishan> ah..Ill edit straight away 14:34 <Tishan> Done! 14:35 <sdumitriu1> OK, looks better 14:36 <Tishan> :) 14:36 <kushalk124> Another 15mins for deadline :) 14:37 <kushalk124> is now known as <kushalkhandelwal> 14:40 <gustavojordan> sdumitriu, i can edit my proposal (timeline and architecture) now? 14:41 <gustavojordan> about yours comments 14:43 <sdumitriu1> Yes 14:47 <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu1: Should I make the proposal public ? 14:47 <kushalkhandelwal> Or is it fine like that 14:49 <sdumitriu1> Which proposal? 14:49 <kushalkhandelwal> on melange 14:50 <sdumitriu1> I don't know, leave it like this 14:50 <kushalkhandelwal> Oh ok :) 14:50 <kushalkhandelwal> Can you check it once on melange ? 14:51 <sdumitriu1> I will soon 14:51 <kushalkhandelwal> Ok :) 14:52 <kushalkhandelwal> Last 1 minute 14:52 <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu1: Now you would have a final count on how many proposals to evaluate 14:53 <sdumitriu1> It's a square number 14:54 <sdumitriu1> If we get one more, it will be a prime number 14:54 <Natasha> has joined #phenotips 14:55 <Tishan> 4,16 14:55 <kushalkhandelwal> Let me guess 14:55 <kushalkhandelwal> 36 14:56 <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu1: 14:56 <sdumitriu1> Yes? 14:56 <kushalkhandelwal> 36 is it ? 14:57 <sdumitriu1> You're a good guesser :) 14:57 <kushalkhandelwal> :D :D 14:57 <sdumitriu1> Quick, what number am I thinking about? 14:57 <Tishan> :D 14:57 <Natasha> :D 14:57 <kushalkhandelwal> 49 :P 14:57 <Natasha> is this part of the selection process ? 14:57 <kushalkhandelwal> Random :P 14:58 <sdumitriu1> Nope 14:58 <Natasha> :) 14:58 <kushalkhandelwal> Ohh :( 14:58 <Natasha> I just wrote you at @sdumitriu 14:58 <kushalkhandelwal> Its a 2 digit number :P 14:59 <gustavojordan> hahaha :-) 19h UTC time, finish submissions 14:59 <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu1: 36 applications , you got a lot to do for next 2 weeks 15:00 <sdumitriu1> Yes... 15:00 <sdumitriu1> Natasha: sdumitriu is back home 15:00 <Tishan> goood luck with it :) 15:00 <Tishan> got to devs 15:00 <Tishan> cya 15:01 <gustavojordan> sdumitriu, many students of different countries have applied? 15:01 <Natasha> ok 15:01 <gustavojordan> how many? 15:02 <Tishan> has quit 15:04 <kushalkhandelwal> has quit 15:05 <vshivam> has quit 15:16 <sdumitriu1> I'm not sure, a bit more than 10 countries 15:17 <sdumitriu1> I mean, 10 countries where they're doing their studies, but some are studying in US or Canada, but originaly from someplace else 15:17 <sdumitriu1> That complicates the count 15:18 <gustavojordan> nice, just curious :-) 15:25 <gustavojordan> has quit 15:29 <gustavojordan> has joined #phenotips 15:58 <Natasha> has quit 16:28 <sdumitriu1> has quit 16:52 <BogdanVancea> has quit 17:31 <Natasha> has joined #phenotips 17:32 <gustavojordan> has quit 18:01 <krinye> has quit 18:12 <Natasha> has quit 21:05 <vulture> has quit 22:39 <ravigarg27> has quit 22:43 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #phenotips 23:00 <kushalkhandelwal> has quit
